title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Vehicle Internet Distributed Learning Framework Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design a collaborative learning model utilizing a vehicle-fog hierarchical structure in a distributed learning environment.
Learners can implement a learning protocol that ensures data privacy by applying network-level masking techniques.
Learners can propose a method to improve signal efficiency through topology optimization using a distributed consensus algorithm.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
